name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > {startTime} AND n.completionDateEpochTime < {endTime} WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity

name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > {startTime} AND n.completionDateEpochTime < {endTime} WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity

name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > {startTime} AND n.completionDateEpochTime < {endTime} WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity

name: Average Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)  WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as avgOutput

name: Average Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)  WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as avgOutput

name: Total Number of Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} RETURN count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Total Number of Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} RETURN count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Successful Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Successful Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Failed Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKstatus='Failure' RETURN count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Failed Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKstatus='Failure' RETURN  count(n) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Maximum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Max(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as MaxBuildTime

name: Maximum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Max(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as MaxBuildTime

name: Minimum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  COALESCE(Min(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as MinBuildTime

DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Min(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as MinBuildTime

name: Average Duration of Succesful Deployments
DBQuery: MATCH (n:RUNDECK:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'DEPLOYMENT' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as averageDeploymentDuration

name: Number of Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' RETURN count(n) as totalDefect

name: Number of Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' RETURN count(n) as totalDefect

name: Number of Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' RETURN count(n) as totalDefect

name: Number of Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' RETURN count(n) as totalDefect

name: Number of Closed Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN count(n) as ClosedDefect

name: Number of Closed Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN count(n) as ClosedDefect

name: Number of Open Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Open'  RETURN count(n) as OpenDefect

name: Number of Open Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Open'  RETURN count(n) as OpenDefect

name: Average Defect Duration
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as AvgDefectCompletionTime

name: Average Defect Duration
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as AvgDefectCompletionTime

name: Average Code Issues in Deployment
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} and n.SPKvector = 'CODEQUALITY' with n where n.SPKstatus='Success'  RETURN  toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKbugs))) as Bugs , toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKcodeSmellsStr))) as CodeSmell, toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKVulnerabilitiesStr))) as Vulnerablilities
